text: Abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona n’abamugaye amaguru, ndetse n’abafite uburwayi ubwo ari bwo bwose, nta mugayo cyangwa icyaha bazabarwaho (igihe batagiye ku rugamba). Bityo, uzumvira Allah n’Intumwa ye, azamwinjiza mu busitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru); naho uzatera umugongo, (Allah) azamuhanisha ibihano bibabaza
